BackstoryDef.title: Slingshot Modder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] liked making and modding slingshots as a kit. [PAWN_pronoun] often rummaged through discarded building materials and electronics to look for any scraps that can make [PAWN_possessive] inventions hit better or harder, and sometimes got into trouble when the same inventions were responsible for some stones through expensive windows.

BackstoryDef.title: Gamer Kit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The favorite pastime of [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] young pack was a virtual combat game at the caretaking center. [PAWN_nameDef] got quite good at popping heads with a fake laser pistol, but never got into a real fight outside of the game.

BackstoryDef.title: Young Hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s pack belonged to a fringe tribe of survivalists who refused to use many technologies and survived in the wild in small, hand-built shelters. [PAWN_pronoun] showed an aptitude for shooting early on, and was taught to handle a rifle at a very young age to hunt for food or defend [PAWN_possessive] pack from dangers. Discontent with living in the wild, the pack began collecting a stash of valuables, and eventually used it (and their young, adorable faces) to bribe a trade ship and get to a more civilized life.

BackstoryDef.title: Crash Survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The earliest memory that [PAWN_nameDef] had was being carried out of the remain of a burning spaceship by rescuers after a deadly low orbit crash that only [PAWN_pronoun] survived. The physical injury healed quickly thanks to the advanced treatments, but [PAWN_pronoun] never completely recovered from the mental shock. [PAWN_nameDef] used food, and later, experimentations with cooking as a coping mechanism, and shared the results with [PAWN_possessive] foster pack.

BackstoryDef.title: Martial Arts Kit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a kit, [PAWN_nameDef] was obsessed with the Avalian martial arts that took advantage of the low gravity on the moon, and elected to take classes for it. The caretakers were encouraging about it, purely because it kept [PAWN_objective] active.

BackstoryDef.title: Bully
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] pack of kits frequently got into trouble for taking toys or snacks that don't belong to them, and their antics got more elaborate as they grew older, even making some traps that others would trip on. Surprisingly, they were quite fair with sharing their ill-gotten gains among themselves.

BackstoryDef.title: Memory Wiped
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never knew what happened in [PAWN_possessive] own childhood other than that [PAWN_pronoun] came out of a medical pod, more refreshed than ever, before being greeted by [PAWN_possessive] pack. The only thing about [PAWN_objective] that was unusual is [PAWN_possessive] uncanny awareness of surroundings and the ability to quickly strike vitals in unarmed combat. After fruitlessly trying to find out about [PAWN_possessive] past that even [PAWN_possessive] own pack kept from [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_nameDef] left a letter one night and left. Maybe [PAWN_possessive] real pack is out there. Somewhere.

BackstoryDef.title: Engineer's Apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned for unknown reasons as an egg, and was taken in by a pack of nomads that lived on their spaceship. [PAWN_pronoun] followed the ship's old technician around to learn about undocked ship repairs and eventually was trusted with some minor maintenance duty.

BackstoryDef.title: Treehouse Builder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] pack was raised on a moon colony similar to the home world Avalon. The pack frequently wandered into the wild for adventures, and built many treehouses out of abandoned lightweight building materials and some wood.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] belonged to a pack of builders who maintained a dying art of building with interlocking structures without fasteners. [PAWN_pronoun] learned quick, but never took the craft seriously. As [PAWN_pronoun] stayed home one day because of a minor sickness, the pack’s ship engine critically malfunctioned. [PAWN_nameDef] was left with nothing but shelves upon shelves of books, and an obligation to pass on the knowledge.
